metadata.title: CVE-2021-25786 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in QPDF version 10.0.4, allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary code via crafted .pdf file to Pl_ASCII85Decoder::writeparameter in libqpdf.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf28 - 10.6.3-1
qpdf - 10.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.6.3-1').
